title: Introducing: French Royalty
content:
Damn, really falling for this LA duo, French Royalty (Paige Califano and Josh Story) and their self-titled debut EP.

From the brilliantly bizarre and over the top (Daggers), to the straight up pop of EP closer Palm Tree Sadness, they instil the sensuality of a Lana Del Rey or Lykke Li, with the ability to write a killer electronic-pop song that we’ve seen recently from the likes of CHVRCHES and Broods. There’s a real memorable kick to French Royalty, and definitely enough to suggest that they’re well worth keeping an eye on. Check out the full EP below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
